value.name: Man shot by police in Syracuse dies
value.description: Police said Monday that 49-year-old Thomas Hamby died over the weekend. Syracuse police spokeswoman Erin Behm says Hamby was shot Thursday after he walked out of his home and fired a gun at police ...
